cards.rules_text:
Whenever another creature you control dies, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
{1}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Create a 1/1 green Scout creature token. Activate only as a sorcery.

Create two 1/1 white Angel creature tokens with flying. If a player has 10 or less life, instead create a 5/5 black Horror creature token, then put five +1/+1 counters on it if a player has 5 or less life.

Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. If you've seen signs this turn, you gain 3 life. [i](You've seen signs if two or more cards types entered your graveyard.)[/i]
cards.notes: prev: With no god to turn to, humanity turned to its creations for guidance.

cards.rules_text:
{1}{R}: Adapt 1. [i](If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)[/i]
At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control with power 4 or greater gains haste and trample until end of turn.

Bloodied Blademaster has double strike as long as a creature you control died this turn.
{1}{R}{W}, Sacrifice another creature: Bloodied Blademaster deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life. Activate only as a sorcery.

Satiated Horror doesn't untap during your untap step.
{1}, Sacrifice another creature: Untap Satiated Horror. Activate only during your turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Consumption is normality, and in normality there is control.[/i]

cards.rules_text: When Floating Vagrant enters, tap up to one target creature. If you've seen signs this turn, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. [i](You've seen signs if two or more cards types entered your graveyard.)[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Angelic Grace enters, create a 1/1 white Angel creature token with flying.
Whenever a creature you control with flying enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control without flying.

Enchant permanent

Enchanted permanent can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.
Exile target creature.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Dias found their supremacy over mortals utter and complete, but this was not what Lamech promised. There was neither fear nor resistance to such power, merely a resigned acceptance.[/i]
cards.notes: prev: With power over creation, Dias began to unravel those mired in the old ways.

cards.flavor_text: [i]“I have lost. Oh, much I have lost. A child, a lover, a mother. A friend not yet mature breathing out softly in my arms. A mentor whose form imprinted onto me wholly. Yet there is naught to do but continue. I have lost dear youth, and mourn me, for to you I shall become it.”[/i]
